name: FROG Gear Solid
description:
FROG GEAR SOLID

FROG Gear Solid is 2D, top-down, action game with an emphasis on stealth. Inspired by the old classic: "Metal Gear Solid", FROG Gear Solid puts you in the shoes of a top-secret agent named Dmitri! Use your various frog skills as you try to overcome each encounter and stop the "Crocodile Mafia". 

HOW TO PLAY

WASD or Arrow Keys: Move

F: Melee Attack

V: VRAKKK!!!

CREDITS

Developed for the "Game Development GAD2017" course in Bahcesehir University (Digital Game Design), "FROG Gear Solid" is our final project for the 3rd semester. 

Feyzi Ataberk Tiftik - Lighting & SFX Artist 

Yiğit Doruk - Developer & Designer 

Yiğit Ömer Kayhan - Artist & Level Designer
